title: Email Addresses of All UMass Dartmouth Undergraduate Students, Spring 2025 Semester

communications.communication:
Hello,

Pursuant to the Massachusetts Public Records Law, I hereby request the university email addresses of every undergraduate student registered for any number of credits in the Spring 2025 semester at UMass Dartmouth. This request is not for commercial purposes, nor is it a media inquiry.

Please provide this information electronically by spreadsheet. Please deliver the requested spreadsheet via email to aj@vincelli.org no later than Monday March 10th 2025 (10 business days from today).

Thank you,

AJ Vincelli
(75% she/her)
